mapper.select: select board_category_id, board_category_name from board_category_tb where board_category_name = #{boardCategoryName}

select bct.board_category_id as boardCategoryId, bct.board_category_name as boardCategoryName, (select count(*) from board_tb where board_category_id = bct.board_category_id) as boardCount from board_category_tb bct inner join board_tb bt on(bt.board_category_id = bct.board_category_id) where bt.user_id = #{userId} group by bct.board_category_id, bct.board_category_name
